attributes.action: Investigation into violent disorder of former members of the Oxford Bullingdon Club
attributes.additional_details: Contemporary accounts place David Cameron and Boris Johnson on an evening out with the Bullingdon Club in 1987.  During the course of the evening the wanton destruction of property occurred and perpetrators fled from the police.  There is anecdotal evidence of many incidents of violent disorder committed by members of this club.  The police force should investigate all incidence of such riotous disorder and press charges where applicable, regardless of the perpetrators' attempts to cover the costs of their damage.
